page.title: 15A Boy's Home & School Life
page.content: On Wednesday I got up at 8.00.am. My baby brother was crying his head off while we were getting dressed. Then we brushed our teeth. I went to the kitchen to make our breakfast. After that we went into our Mum's bed,then we went to school. First I went to assembley .Then I wrote about the day when the class went out.Then it was first break.Some people were finishing off their writing while I was doing the Oxford English book. At 12.00. it was Lunch break. Later the class went swimming .When swimming finshed Kevin & Graham & Jonathan & I put the cover on the swimming pool.At quarter past three we went home.On the way my baby brother was crying.Then I got changed and played out side until it was tea time after tea I watched television. I went to bed at 9.30. Hanif Dhavnani age 10
